DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the early onset of effect of Symbicort compared to Advair Diskus and Ventolin in adults with asthma
DOC.mesh_term: Fluticasone Propionate, Salmeterol Xinafoate Drug Combination
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of asthma and baseline lung function test results as determined by protocol Required and received asthma maintenance therapy within previous 4 weeks at doses determined by protocol Severe asthma or asthma markedly affected by seasonal factors Has required treatment with any noninhaled corticosteroids within previous 4 weeks, has sensitivity to drugs specified in the protocol or requires treatment with betablockers
